TopicTitle: Manned Niven return in GPP 2.5x scale KSP 1.2.3.

Articles.Content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NEgAMREz0GY&feature=youtu.be

I just completed my manned return from Niven in GPP 2.5x scale. It was a challenging mission due to the use of stock parts in a scaled-up save but with MOAR boosters and a good bit of Kerbucks it is doable.
